item.title: Here's the 2025 team-by-team Sarasota and Manatee high school football schedules
item.description: The 2025 high school football season begins with Florida High School Athletic Association Kickoff Classics on Aug. 14. The regular season begins Aug. 21 and runs through Oct. 31 (with the exception of IMG which will play into November) with most teams playing 10 games in 11 weeks.

item.description: Professional wrestler, WWE icon and longtime FloridianHulk Hogan diedat 71 last week, and his cause of death has officially been determined.

item.title: See best time to see popular meteor shower, the Perseids
item.description: Beat the Florida heat, especially if you can't sleep, and head outside to see thePerseids meteor showerthis weekend.

item.title: Breck Kolojay, IMG Academy 4-star OL, commits to USC…
item.description: Four-star offensive lineman Breck Kolojay announced his commitment to USC during IMG Academy's media day on Friday, Aug. 1.

item.title: How much did Longboat mansion sells for after just 25 days on market?
item.description: Compass Real Estate – a nationwide residential real estate firm –seized the recordfor the most expensive residential sale in Sarasota County history at $30.3 million on Thursday, July 31, according to the company's press release.

item.title: Florida to rev up immigration arrests with FHP strike team, DeSantis says
item.description: Florida Highway Patrol troopers have "apprehended almost 3,000" undocumented immigrants so far this year, and that number will continue to go up as the agency prepares to set up a new strike team to increase arrests, officials said Aug. 1.
